name: Death Trap Circus
description:
Please download the exe on windows to experience blood painting and better performance, in-browser go fullscreen once past the menu.

Use Arrow keys or A and D to lean left or right, space bar to jump.

You're a circus performer who died in an accident doing what you love most, unicycling, you must complete the levels doing what is normal to you.... you guessed it unicycling, complete the levels as a ghost to be granted life.
